com.msi.moble

Class DeviceCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msi.moble.DeviceCollection

  • public class DeviceCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents collection of Device instances in range.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLE_ALL
      Code of all BLE devices.
      static int BLE_MESH_ALL
      Code of all MoBLE devices: configured and not configured.
      static int BLE_MESH_CONFIGURED
      Code of configured (provisioned) MoBLE device.
      static int BLE_MESH_UNCONFIGURED
      Code of unconfigured (unprovisioned) MoBLE device.
      static int BLE_MESH_UNKNOWN
      Code of configured but unknown for application devices.
      static int BLE_NO_MESH
      Code of not MoBLE but BLE device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Device getDevice(java.lang.String addr)
      Gets Device instance of BLE device stored in collection by its MAC address
      java.util.Collection<Device> getDevices(int filter, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dataBase)
      Constructs device collection with filter.

    • Field Detail

      • BLE_MESH_CONFIGURED

        public static final int BLE_MESH_CONFIGURED
        Code of configured (provisioned) MoBLE device. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLE_MESH_UNCONFIGURED

        public static final int BLE_MESH_UNCONFIGURED
        Code of unconfigured (unprovisioned) MoBLE device. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLE_NO_MESH

        public static final int BLE_NO_MESH
        Code of not MoBLE but BLE device. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLE_MESH_UNKNOWN

        public static final int BLE_MESH_UNKNOWN
        Code of configured but unknown for application devices. Such devices are called as "Not added" devices. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLE_MESH_ALL

        public static final int BLE_MESH_ALL
        Code of all MoBLE devices: configured and not configured. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLE_ALL

        public static final int BLE_ALL
        Code of all BLE devices. Use this code in method getDevices(int, Collection).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDevices

        public java.util.Collection<Device> getDevices(int filter,
                                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dataBase)
        Constructs device collection with filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - bitmask from the following flags: BLE_MESH_CONFIGURED, BLE_MESH_UNCONFIGURED, BLE_NO_MESH, BLE_MESH_UNKNOWN, BLE_MESH_ALL, BLE_ALL.
        dataBase - database of MAC addresses known BLE devices.
        Returns:
        Device collection filled by Device instances according filtering rule.

      • getDevice

        public Device getDevice(java.lang.String addr)
        Gets Device instance of BLE device stored in collection by its MAC address
        Parameters:
        addr - MAC address of BLE device
        Returns:
        Device instance of BLE device if it is found and null otherwise.
